title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - Wikipedia
snippet: Jean-Luc Antoine Pierre Mélenchon ... established in 2016. He was the deputy in the National Assembly for the 4th constituency of Bouches-du-Rhône from 2017 to 2022 and led the La France Insoumise group in the National Assembly from 2017 to 2021....

title: Who Is Jean-Luc Melenchon? All About The New Popular Front Leader | Europe - Times Now
snippet: Jean-Luc Melenchon, born on August 19, 1951, in Tangier, Morocco, is the son of a postmaster and a primary school teacher.After working as a teacher for a while, Melenchon entered politics in September 1976 and joined the Socialist Party (PS).
